content: Career Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Dec 2018How do I deal with unreasonable superiors?Basically, I got scolded for not answering my mobile phone as it was charging and in silent mode on another table. The female Warrant Officer then said what if someone is passing away and needed to call me urgently, then how? I couldn't be bothered to reply/rebut as I don't want to risk getting charged or having to sign extra. Anyway if that's the case, shouldn't all trainees be allowed to carry their phone with them at all times? Simply unreasonable!3 answersAnswerBump0
